definition: small and remote and insignificant, a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government (either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence)
details:
adjective
- small and remote and insignificant
= synonyms: jerkwater
- wasting time
= synonyms: pokey
noun
- a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government (either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence)
= synonyms: pokey
